overview: Give a girl an orgasm and you'll make her happy for a day. Give a girl an industrial-strength sex toy and you'll make her happy for a lifetime! While we're certain that your special gal-pal loves the attention you pay to her sensitive nether-regions, we're equally as certain that she'd love nothing more than to feel the raw power of a plug-in vibrator shaking orgasms out of her pussy like an epileptic in a 6.9 earthquake.
title: Fantasy Solos 2
